Traits.Name: Echoing Whispers
Traits.Content: The Symphony of Echoes emanates disorienting sounds that may confuse creatures. Creatures that start their turn within 30 feet of it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be unable to take reactions until the start of their next turn.

Traits.Name: Haunting Melody
Traits.Content: Whenever a creature hears the Symphony of Echoes, it must make a DC 15 Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, that creature has disadvantage on saving throws against being frightened for 1 minute.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Symphony of Echoes makes two Sound Wave attacks. If the Symphony is engaged with another creature, it can also use its Echoing Grasp once.

Actions.Name: Sound Wave
Actions.Content: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) thunder damage. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be deafened until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Echoing Grasp
Actions.Content: One creature that is deafened by the Symphony of Echoes must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be enveloped in a haunting echo that causes it to be incapacitated until the end of its next turn. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

Actions.Name: Cacophonic Burst
Actions.Content: The Symphony releases a disorienting blast of sound in a 30-foot radius. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 30 (4d12 + 4) psychic damage and is frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. This ability can't be used again until the Symphony of Echoes finishes a short or long rest.
